Name: Viet Grill Three and a half chilli rated

Content.summary: 'Viet Grill Three and a half chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, Bun Bo Hue, Hospitality Recreation written on 23 December 2006
Content.tags: London, Bun Bo Hue, Hospitality Recreation, Vietnamese, Viet Grill, Kingsland Road
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 02/12/2006

Three and a half chilli rated

58 Kingsland Road, London, E2 8DP
http://www.london-eating.co.uk/7084.htm

We'd been here before the ratings began and were not impressed, but duty bound to cover all Bun Bo Hue on the Kingsland road we returned.

Things had improved, a slightly above average bowl. Nothing to write home about in terms of spice or flavour, but a steady performer anyway.

Good for: Nothing really, just average.
Bad for: No chilli sauce on the tables.
